comments:
using I20071204-0800

log view settings:
group by -> session
do not show search text
activate on new events

double-clicking on an entry produces the following error:

Created an attachment (id=84460)
fix

The issue was that the code checks a completely unrelated field for null right before setting a null string as the text for more session information. 

Fix is to check if the session information is null before trying to set the session information in the text field.

Nice catch Michael.  Your fix was right on.  

When you get a chance go ahead and send me a head shot with a leafy background so we can add you to the PDE contributor page.
